description:
Identity Desktop is Ubiquiti's free tier Identity application for Windows.

Unifi Identity Desktop is Ubiquiti's new free tier Identity application for Windows. Allowing for One-Click WiFi, One-Click VPN, and more.
Overview: * UniFi Identity Endpoint Windows 1.1.2.74 includes the following improvements. Improvements: * Ensure that the One-Click WiFi and VPN connection remains active when switching between consoles.
